site.name: Stack Overflow
site.about: Stack Overflow is a question and answer site for professional and enthusiast programmers.

site.name: English Language & Usage
site.about: English Language & Usage Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for linguists, etymologists, and serious English language enthusiasts.

site.name: Mathematics
site.about: Mathematics Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for people studying math at any level and professionals in related fields.
